title: Ruined Tomb of Modlordra
story: For several centuries the tomb of Modlordra remained sealed. Now it is controlled by a gang of hobgoblins. It is rumored that a legendary stone Damagtheri is hidden here.

notes.text: A large stone door with two keyholes on the western wall.
A brash halfling, examining a mysterious, made of an unknown material axe.
A tapestry on the wall depicting the sun-drenched desert around the tomb.
A mutilated body of a monk, a key nearby.
A key locked in a  safe.
Some gold and a chainmail among rubble on the ground.
